text:
@WhiteHouse Not if the WH does not shut down communist mayors and govs throwing LEGAL Americans in jail for NEEDING not wanting NEEDING to re open thier business!

And letting convicted criminals go free? WTF! We can build thousands and thousands of beds for COVID19 patients but not cells?
